app.name: tRPC
app.one_liner: Move fast and break nothing with end-to-end typesafe APIs made easy.

screens.name: API Definition & Consumption
screens.purpose: Enable developers to define and call typesafe remote procedures seamlessly between client and server.
primary_actions: Call procedures from client with type safety

rust_commands.name: create_procedure
rust_commands.purpose: Define a new typesafe remote procedure endpoint on the server.

rust_commands.name: invoke_procedure
rust_commands.purpose: Call a remote procedure from the client with validated input and typed response.

mvp_plan: week 1: Set up tRPC server with basic procedure definition
week 1: Implement client-side procedure invocation with type inference
acceptance_tests: Client can call a server procedure and receive a strongly typed response without runtime schema validation.
Multiple client requests made simultaneously are automatically batched into a single HTTP request.
WebSocket-based subscriptions work with custom encoders as specified in connection parameters.
FormData inputs are correctly serialized when used directly in procedure inputs.
